short_summary: "Provide compost collection and processing service to the John H. Chapman Space Centre (JHCSC).",
description: "The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is continuing its waste management program...",
full_summary:
**Title**
French Title: Service de collecte de matières compostables

**Reference**
Reference number: cb-439-8859114


**Notice Information**
The Canadian Space Agency (ASC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to select a supplier to provide a compost collection service. The selected supplier will be required to provide equipment and labor to collect and process compostable materials at the John H. Chapman Space Centre (JHCSC) located at 6767 Route de l’Aéroport, in Saint Hubert, Quebec.


**Tender Details**
* Solicitation number: 9F030-23-0413
* Publication date: 11 April 2024
* Tender closing date: 30 April 2024 at 14:00:00
* Service start date: 01 July 2024
* Service end date: 31 March 2029


**Notice Type**
The tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and will be governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement.


**Procurement Category**
SRV (Services)


**Contact Information**
To obtain more information on this RFP and the tender process, please contact Mélanie Séguin at the Canadian Space Agency by email at melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca or by telephone at 438-364-1399


**Notice Documents**
The detailed RFP document is available for download at the provided link https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35853/9f030-23-0413---request-for-proposal-%28rfp---compost-collection-service.pdf

Note: *This text has been rephrased to be more concise and professional while maintaining the original content.*
